<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Platforms"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/model-svc/platforms"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a list of AI platforms. Eg. LlamaCpp, StableDiffusion etc.

Requires `model-svc:platform:view` permission.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
